reviewText: Yes, I am one of the suckers caught. What do we learn for $20? We learn to reel in the rods and put them in the boat before starting the big motor. We learn Cpt. Bubba has a box of colorful lures and just got another boat from a sponsor. We learn how to weigh fish in baskets (except the ones that jump out of the baskets). We find out who won the tournament. Oh! - I nearly forgot, Cpt. Bubba has a depthfinder.
